en: Narrator: It is a lovely, bright, sunny day. Peppa and her family are going for a picnic. Daddy Pig is bringing the picnic basket.
cn: 旁白：今天天气晴朗，佩奇一家要去野餐。猪爸爸正带着野餐篮。

en: Daddy Pig: Picnic basket, bread, cheese, tomatoes and lemonade. Is there anything we’ve forgotten?
cn: 猪爸爸：野餐篮、面包、奶酪、西红柿和柠檬水。我们还忘了什么吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy’s strawberry cake.
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈的草莓蛋糕。

en: Daddy Pig: I was just teasing. Mummy’s homemade strawberry cake is there too.
cn: 猪爸爸：我只是逗你玩。妈妈自制的草莓蛋糕也带上了。

en: Daddy Pig: Is everybody ready?
cn: 猪爸爸：大家都准备好了吗？

en: Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: Ready.
cn: 猪妈妈、小猪佩奇、乔治：准备好了。

en: Daddy Pig: Then let’s go.
cn: 猪爸爸：那我们出发吧。

en: Daddy Pig: This looks like just the spot for our picnic.
cn: 猪爸爸：这里看起来很适合野餐。

sentence.en: just the spot for our picnic

examples.en: This is just the spot for playing football.
This is just the spot for looking at the stars.

en: Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: Hurrah!
cn: 猪妈妈、小猪佩奇、乔治：万岁！

en: Daddy Pig: It’s great to be outdoors. We should run around a bit and get some exercise.
cn: 猪爸爸：在户外真好。我们应该跑一跑，锻炼一下。

en: Mummy Pig: I want to eat, then have a nap. I certainly don’t want to run around.
cn: 猪妈妈：我想先吃饭，然后小睡一会儿。我可不想跑来跑去。

sentence.en: I certainly don’t want to run around

examples.en: I certainly don’t want to go shopping.
I certainly don’t want to play tennis.

en: Peppa Pig: Maybe Daddy should run around a bit. His tummy is quite big.
cn: 小猪佩奇：也许爸爸应该多跑跑，他的肚子挺大的。

en: Daddy Pig: My tummy is not big. But later I will get some exercise. Even if no one else does.
cn: 猪爸爸：我的肚子不大。不过等会儿我会锻炼的，就算没人陪我。

points.en: Even if no one else does

en: Mummy Pig: Let’s eat.
cn: 猪妈妈：我们吃饭吧。

en: Daddy Pig: Good idea, Mummy Pig. I’m really hungry.
cn: 猪爸爸：好主意，猪妈妈。我真的饿了。

en: Daddy Pig: Delicious.
cn: 猪爸爸：真好吃。

en: Daddy Pig: Aah, I feel quite sleepy.
cn: 猪爸爸：啊，我有点困了。

en: Mummy Pig: I thought you wanted to run around a bit, Daddy Pig.
cn: 猪妈妈：我还以为你要跑一跑呢，猪爸爸。

sentence.en: I thought you wanted to run around a bit
sentence.cn: 我还以为你要跑一跑呢

examples.en: I thought you wanted to read a book.
I thought you wanted to go swimming.

en: Daddy Pig: Later.
cn: 猪爸爸：等会儿吧。

en: Peppa Pig: Look, there’s a little duck pond.
cn: 小猪佩奇：看，有个小鸭塘。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, can we feed the ducks?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，我们可以喂鸭子吗？

en: Mummy Pig: Yes, you can feed them the rest of the bread.
cn: 猪妈妈：可以，把剩下的面包喂给它们吧。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George love feeding bread to ducks.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治喜欢喂鸭子吃面包。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, I think they want some more.
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，我觉得它们还想吃。

en: Mummy Pig: That was the last of the bread. I’m sure they’ve had enough.
cn: 猪妈妈：面包已经没有了，我相信它们吃饱了。

sentence.en: That was the last of the bread.

examples.en: That was the last of the cake.
That was the last of the juice.

en: Peppa Pig: Sorry, Mrs Duck. We’ve no more bread.
cn: 小猪佩奇：对不起，鸭太太，我们没有面包了。

examples.en: We’ve no more milk.
We’ve no more honey.

en: Narrator: The ducks want more food.
cn: 旁白：鸭子们还想要吃的。

en: Mummy Pig: So much for Daddy Pig and his exercise.
cn: 猪妈妈：猪爸爸的锻炼就到此为止了。

en: Daddy Pig: What?
cn: 猪爸爸：什么？

en: Mummy Pig: You lot again? Peppa told you; there’s no more bread.
cn: 猪妈妈：你们又来了？佩奇说了，没有面包了。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, we do have strawberry cake.
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，我们还有草莓蛋糕。

en: Mummy Pig: Well, if there’s any cake left over you can give it to the ducks.
cn: 猪妈妈：如果蛋糕有剩下的，可以给鸭子吃。

sentence.en: if there’s any cake left over

examples.en: if there’s any juice left over
if there’s any apple left over

en: Narrator: Everybody likes Mummy Pig’s homemade strawberry cake.
cn: 旁白：大家都喜欢猪妈妈做的草莓蛋糕。

en: Mummy Pig: A wasp! I hate wasps. Shoo!
cn: 猪妈妈：有只黄蜂！我讨厌黄蜂，走开！

en: Daddy Pig: What a fuss, Mummy Pig. It’s only a little wasp.
cn: 猪爸爸：猪妈妈，别大惊小怪，只是一只小黄蜂。

en: Mummy Pig: Go away, wasp.
cn: 猪妈妈：走开，黄蜂。

en: Daddy Pig: Just stay still, Mummy Pig. Then it will fly away.
cn: 猪爸爸：别动，猪妈妈，它就会飞走。

en: Daddy Pig: There, you see? All you had to do was stay still.
cn: 猪爸爸：看吧，你只要不动就行了。

sentence.en: All you had to do was stay still

examples.en: All you had to do was wait.
All you had to do was ask.

en: Daddy Pig: Get away. Scram.
cn: 猪爸爸：走开，快走开。

en: Daddy Pig: Help!
cn: 猪爸爸：救命啊！

en: Daddy Pig: Shoo! Get it off me.
cn: 猪爸爸：走开，别在我身上。

en: Peppa Pig: I hope the wasp doesn’t sting daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：希望黄蜂别蜇爸爸。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, get away, you little pest.
cn: 猪爸爸：走开，你这小讨厌鬼。

en: Mummy Pig: No, Daddy Pig is running too fast for the wasp to catch him.
cn: 猪妈妈：不会的，猪爸爸跑得太快，黄蜂追不上他。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig is running too fast for the wasp to catch him
sentence.cn: 猪爸爸跑得太快，黄蜂追不上他

examples.en: The dog is running too fast for the cat to catch it.
examples.cn: 狗跑得太快，猫追不上它。

examples.en: The child is running too fast for the ball to catch it.
examples.cn: 孩子跑得太快，球追不上他。

en: Peppa Pig: Let’s eat our cake before the wasp comes back.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我们趁黄蜂没回来赶快吃蛋糕吧。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh no, we forgot to leave any for the ducks.
cn: 小猪佩奇：糟了，我们忘了给鸭子留蛋糕了。

sentence.en: we forgot to leave any for the ducks
sentence.cn: 我们忘了给鸭子留蛋糕了

examples.en: we forgot to leave any for the birds
examples.cn: 我们忘了给鸟儿留食物了

examples.en: we forgot to leave any for the children
examples.cn: 我们忘了给孩子们留零食了

en: Daddy Pig: I think I lost it.
cn: 猪爸爸：我想我甩掉它了。

en: Mummy Pig: You said you would run around and get some exercise, Daddy Pig, but I didn’t believe you’d do it.
cn: 猪妈妈：你说要跑步锻炼，猪爸爸，我还不信你会真的去做。

sentence.en: I didn’t believe you’d do it
sentence.cn: 我还不信你会真的去做

examples.en: I didn’t believe you’d finish the job.
examples.cn: 我还不信你会完成这项工作。

examples.en: I didn’t believe you’d win the game.
examples.cn: 我还不信你会赢得比赛。

en: Daddy Pig: Luckily, I managed to hang on to my slice of strawberry cake.
cn: 猪爸爸：幸好我还保住了我的那块草莓蛋糕。

sentence.en: I managed to hang on to my slice of strawberry cake
sentence.cn: 我还保住了我的那块草莓蛋糕

examples.en: I managed to hang on to my book.
I managed to hang on to my toy.

en: Peppa Pig: Stop, Daddy. We promised the rest of the cake for the ducks.
cn: 小猪佩奇：停下，爸爸。我们答应把剩下的蛋糕留给鸭子。

sentence.en: We promised the rest of the cake for the ducks
sentence.cn: 我们答应把剩下的蛋糕留给鸭子

examples.en: We promised the rest of the food for the birds.
examples.cn: 我们答应把剩下的食物留给鸟儿。

examples.en: We promised the rest of the toys for the children.
examples.cn: 我们答应把剩下的玩具留给孩子们。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦。

en: Peppa Pig: You’re very lucky ducks. Say thank you to Daddy Pig.
cn: 小猪佩奇：你们真幸运，鸭子们。要谢谢猪爸爸。

points.en: Say thank you to Daddy Pig

en: Daddy Pig: You’re most welcome.
cn: 猪爸爸：不客气。

en: Mummy Pig: It’s time to go home. Say goodbye to the ducks.
cn: 猪妈妈：该回家了，和鸭子们说再见。

en: Peppa Pig: Bye-bye, ducks. See you next time.
cn: 小猪佩奇：再见，鸭子们，下次见。
